attrTransmission.name: transmission
attrTransmission.comment: enables/disables refractive solid model (binary 0|1 for plausibility)

attrSpecularModel.name: specular_model
attrSpecularModel.label: specular model
attrSpecularModel.comment: sets the normal distribution function for specular.  GGX is currently isotropic only

attrRefractiveIndex.name: refractive_index
attrRefractiveIndex.label: refractive index
attrRefractiveIndex.comment: defines the Fresnel behavior (affects only refraction when model is Toon)

attrAnisotropy.name: anisotropy
attrAnisotropy.comment: controls the shape of the primary reflection

attrMetallicColor.name: metallic_color
attrMetallicColor.label: metallic color
attrMetallicColor.comment: the overall reflection color, defines Fresnel behavior

attrMetallicEdgeColor.name: metallic_edge_color
attrMetallicEdgeColor.label: metallic edge color
attrMetallicEdgeColor.comment: the reflection color at grazing angles, defines Fresnel behavior

attrToonSpecularIntensity.name: toon_specular_intensity
attrToonSpecularIntensity.label: toon specular intensity
attrToonSpecularIntensity.comment: The overall intensity of the toon specular response

attrToonSpecularFresnelBlend.name: toon_specular_fresnel_blend
attrToonSpecularFresnelBlend.label: toon specular fresnel blend
attrToonSpecularFresnelBlend.comment: The amount of fresnel to use for the toon specular response

attrToonSpecularStretchU.name: toon_specular_stretch_u
attrToonSpecularStretchU.label: toon specular stretch u
attrToonSpecularStretchU.comment: Amount to stretch or compress the specular in the u direction

attrToonSpecularStretchV.name: toon_specular_stretch_v
attrToonSpecularStretchV.label: toon specular stretch v
attrToonSpecularStretchV.comment: Amount to stretch or compress the specular in the v direction

attrToonSpecularUseInputVectors.name: toon_specular_use_input_vectors_for_stretch
attrToonSpecularUseInputVectors.label: toon specular use input vectors for stretch
attrToonSpecularUseInputVectors.comment: when checked, use input_U and V. otherwise use geometry dPds/t

attrToonSpecularInputU.name: toon_specular_input_U
attrToonSpecularInputU.label: toon specular input U
attrToonSpecularInputU.comment: input U / tangent for specular stretch

attrToonSpecularInputV.name: toon_specular_input_V
attrToonSpecularInputV.label: toon specular input V
attrToonSpecularInputV.comment: input V / bitangent for specular stretch

attrToonSpecularRampInputScale.name: toon_specular_ramp_input_scale
attrToonSpecularRampInputScale.label: toon specular ramp input scale
attrToonSpecularRampInputScale.comment: Scales the input value x to the ramp lookup y, where x is based on the angle between the sample direction and normal.  This has the effect of squashing or stretching the ramp point positions towards/away from 0.

attrToonSpecularRampValues.name: toon_specular_values
attrToonSpecularRampValues.comment: List of colors on the ramp

attrToonSpecularRampInterpolators.name: toon_specular_interpolations
attrToonSpecularRampInterpolators.comment: None: 0 | Linear: 1 | Exponential Up: 2 | Exponential Down: 3 |\n\t\t\tSmooth: 4 | Catmull Rom: 5 | Monotone Cubic: 6

attrToonSpecularRampMultiplier.name: toon_specular_mult
attrToonSpecularRampMultiplier.label: toon specular mult
attrToonSpecularRampMultiplier.comment: Bindable multiplier on the toon specular ramp value

attrToonSpecularRampPositionOffset.name: toon_specular_offset
attrToonSpecularRampPositionOffset.label: toon specular offset
attrToonSpecularRampPositionOffset.comment: Bindable offset to the toon specular ramp-position, add a small variation using noise etc for art-directable ramp thresholds

attrToonSpecularEnableInputNormal.name: toon_specular_enable_input_normal
attrToonSpecularEnableInputNormal.label: toon specular enable input normal
attrToonSpecularEnableInputNormal.comment: enables sampling the normal map for toon toon specular

attrToonSpecularInputNormal.name: toon_specular_input_normal
attrToonSpecularInputNormal.label: toon specular input normal
attrToonSpecularInputNormal.comment: specifies an alternate shading normal for toon toon specular

attrToonSpecularInputNormalDial.name: toon_specular_input_normal_dial
attrToonSpecularInputNormalDial.label: toon specular input normal dial
attrToonSpecularInputNormalDial.comment: controls influence of input normal versus hair normal for toon toon specular

attrToonSpecularEnableIndirectReflection.name: toon_specular_enable_indirect_reflections
attrToonSpecularEnableIndirectReflection.label: toon specular enable indirect reflections
attrToonSpecularEnableIndirectReflection.comment: enables indirect GGX reflections for toon specular model

attrToonSpecularIndirectReflectionsInten.name: toon_specular_indirect_reflections_intensity
attrToonSpecularIndirectReflectionsInten.label: toon specular indirect reflections intensity
attrToonSpecularIndirectReflectionsInten.comment: the intensity for the indirect reflections of the toon specular model

attrToonSpecularIndirectReflectionsRough.name: toon_specular_indirect_reflections_roughness
attrToonSpecularIndirectReflectionsRough.label: toon specular indirect reflections roughness
attrToonSpecularIndirectReflectionsRough.comment: the roughness for the indirect reflections of the toon specular model

attrPreventLightCulling.name: prevent_light_culling
attrPreventLightCulling.label: prevent light culling
attrPreventLightCulling.comment: WARNING: Experimental and must be used with max_depth: 0 and only for non-photoreal looks. Prevents culling of lights so surfaces can be lit purely with respect to the shading normal irrespective of geometry
